name: Avoid JDBC Connections having password type as string (TIBCO BW)
description: For Security reason, Password should not be of string type. A password type should be used instead.
output:
This report lists all  JDBC resources having  password type as string.
It provides the following information:
JDBC Resource full name.
The associated value is the number of  JDBC Resources
rationale: For security reasons, JDBC Resources should use Password type for the Password parameter in the configuration.
remediation: Verify the JDBC Resource password type
